title: Love is Sweet
overview: Jiang Jun, a driven woman with a background in economics and psychology, leaves philanthropy to fulfill her late fatherâ€™s wish by joining a top investment firm. There, she faces intense competition and reunites with her childhood friend-turned-rival, Yuan Shuai. With her intelligence and resilience, she navigates workplace challenges, uncovering hidden schemes while finding success in both her career and love.
